Dr. Avadhesh Narayan Khare is a renowned cardiologist in Bhopal with more than 2,600 successful angioplasties under his belt.

Dr. Rahul Jain is another experienced cardiologist in Bhopal who performs echo, TMT, and other diagnostic procedures.

Dr. R.K Singh Cardiologist Clinic, run by Dr. Rakesh Kumar Singh, offers comprehensive cardiac care services, including intervention therapies such as angioplasty.

Anupam Cardiac Care, led by Dr Sumit Bhatnagar, provides expert diagnosis and treatment for heart conditions using advanced technologies.

Lastly, Dr Pravir Jha at Bansal Hospital is a highly acclaimed cardiac surgeon with an impressive track record of successful bypass surgeries and other cardiovascular procedures.

These are some of the best cardiologists in Bhopal. Please note that this information does not constitute medical advice or recommendation, and you should always consult your doctor for accurate guidance on your specific condition. In case of any life-threatening situation, call emergency services immediately.
